klapa.title: Klapa and harmful insects are now gone!!!

services.title: Services
services.description: We provide you with efficient and quality services.

service1.title: Disinfection - elimination of harmful microorganisms
service1.description: The main tasks of any disinfection are to eliminate harmful microorganisms that could lead to infections and diseases. Disinfection measures clean the environment from mold, viruses, rot, and microbes.

service2.title: Pest Control - eliminating insects
service2.description: Many people look for pest control methods to get rid of unwanted insects like mosquitoes, cockroaches, ants, and other pests. These insects are not only bothersome but also carry diseases. Pest control eliminates flying and crawling pests such as mosquitoes, cockroaches, ants, and others.

service3.title: Rodent Control - elimination of rodents
service3.description: Rodent control in Tashkent involves a series of comprehensive measures to eliminate rodents. Rodents are resilient creatures, so various methods are used to eradicate them.

type1.title: BEDBUGS
type1.description: They live in beds, soft furniture, textiles, door and window frames. They feed on human and animal blood. They cause allergies and severe psychological discomfort.

type2.title: ROACHES
type2.description: Cockroaches can infest homes and cause health problems. They spread diseases and allergens that can trigger asthma.

type3.title: ANTS
type3.description: Ants invade kitchens and food storage areas. They are known for being social insects, often forming large colonies.

type4.title: MICE
type4.description: Mice are common rodents that invade homes and food storage. They carry diseases and contaminate food with their waste.

type5.title: MOSQUITOS
type5.description: Mosquitoes are pests that transmit diseases such as malaria and dengue fever. They breed in standing water.

rasmiy.title: Official use - 1 year. We provide services to legal entities. The services are licensed!!!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: How is pest control carried out?
faq.a1: Special equipment is used to turn insecticides into an aerosol mist, which penetrates into the smallest gaps between the walls and floor tiles, reaching potential hiding places for insects.
faq.q2: Are the chemicals you use dangerous?
faq.a2: The chemicals are not harmful to humans, pets, or plants. However, the treated room should be ventilated for 40 minutes after treatment.
faq.q3: Do I need to prepare my house for treatment?
faq.a3: Mainly, you should isolate dishes and personal hygiene items. Pets should also be isolated during treatment. No need to cover furniture or appliances.
